entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
